item.title: HowTo set up the Android SDK on Ubuntu for HTC Phones
item.description: In this post I will explain how I set up the Android SDK on Ubuntu for my HTC Desire. I first followed the steps for Ubuntu as described in Setting up a Device for Development: With an Android-powered device, you can develop and debug your Android applications just as you would on the emulator. Before you can start, there are just a few things to do: Declare your application as “debuggable” in your Android Manifest.

item.title: Android 2.2 Froyo Update for HTC Desire
item.description: This weekend i will receive an update to Android 2.2 (Froyo) for my HTC Desire. I am really looking forward to this update. Here is the official video of Google introducing Android 2.2 (Froyo): [youtube yAZYSVr2Bhc]
